'''Sing Your Heart Out''' is a food item that the player can [[cook]]. The [[recipe]] for Sing Your Heart Out is obtainable from Level 2 [[Reputation]] with [[Flower-Feather Clan]].

Depending on the quality, Sing Your Heart Out heals the target [[Character]] for 1 HP every 8 seconds for '''32'''/'''40'''/'''48''' seconds, while briefly displaying the logo of the ''Flower-Feather Clan''. This effect will only activate when the selected character is also the active character. Like most foods, this has no effect for other players in [[Co-Op Mode]].
